title: Party
description: Represents a real-world entity (legal or natural person) involved in a transaction

@id.description: Identifier for the party (DID or IRI)

@type.description: JSON-LD type identifier. Can be 'Party' or a schema.org type like 'https://schema.org/Organization' or 'https://schema.org/Person'

nameHash.description: SHA-256 hash of the normalized party name for privacy-preserving matching

ivms101.description: IVMS101 data structure for Travel Rule compliance

mcc.description: Merchant Category Code (ISO 18245) for merchant parties

url.description: URL pointing to the party's website (based on schema.org/Organization)

logo.description: URL pointing to the party's logo image (based on schema.org/Organization)

description.description: Description of the party (based on schema.org/Organization)
